results.content: A nice light overview of AngularJS.  There was quite a bit of repetition between exercises.  A good start for beginners.
results.content_html: A nice light overview of AngularJS. There was quite a bit of repetition between exercises. A good start for beginners.

results.content: Good course to learn the basics of angularjs. Thanks for the great course.
results.content_html: Good course to learn the basics of angularjs. Thanks for the great course.

results.content: Excellent content & presentation !! One of the best Angular js course for beginners / newbies, I am looking for an advanced level Angular course with live projects from the Author.
results.content_html: Excellent content & presentation !! One of the best Angular js course for beginners / newbies, I am looking for an advanced level Angular course with live projects from the Author.
